import-steps:
<import-step id="-GS-dependencies" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installGSDependencies" title="Dependend GS profiles for " version="">
<dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Install Generic Setup profile dependencies for
<import-step id="-QI-dependencies" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installQIDependencies" title="Dependend QI installables for " version=""> Install quickinstaller dependencies for
<import-step id="-Hide-Types-From-Search" handler="Products..setuphandlers.setupHideTypesFromSearch" title="Hide types from search for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Hides types from the search form for
<import-step id="-Hide-Types-From-Navigation" handler="Products..setuphandlers.setupHideMetaTypesFromNavigations" title="Hide types from navigation for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Hides types from the navigation tree for
<import-step id="-Hide-Tools-From-Navigation" handler="Products..setuphandlers.setupHideToolsFromNavigation" title="Hide Custom tools from Navigation for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Hides custom tools from navigation tree for
<import-step id="-Import-Relations" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installRelations" title="Install Relations for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Installs the relations.xml file into relations library for
<import-step id="-Install-Vocabularies" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installVocabularies" title="Install Vocabularies for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Installs the vocabulary files into vocabulary library for
<import-step id="-Setup-Member-Types" handler="Products..setuphandlers.setupMemberTypes" title="setup Remember(Membrane) types for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> setup Remember(Membrane) types for
<import-step id="-Update-RoleMappings" handler="Products..setuphandlers.updateRoleMappings" title="Update Workflow role mappings for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> updates the workflow role mappings for
<import-step id="-postInstall" handler="Products..setuphandlers.postInstall" title="manual coded post-install for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> manual coded post-install for
